Particle * mLatestParticle

Detailed Description

The ParticlePool is a container class that includes other pools. The ParticlePool acts as one pool with different types of particles.

Protected methods to increase the pools

void ParticleUniverse::ParticlePool::_increaseParticleEmitterPool ( size_t  size,
Particle::ParticleBehaviourList &  behaviours,
ParticleTechnique *  technique 
) [protected]

Pooled emitters should be prepared here, because it cannot be done anywhere else because of the limitation of iterating through the pool. Besides, this is faster.

void ParticleUniverse::ParticlePool::_increaseParticleAffectorPool ( size_t  size,
Particle::ParticleBehaviourList &  behaviours,
ParticleTechnique *  technique 
) [protected]

Pooled affectors should be prepared here, because it cannot be done anywhere else because of the limitation of iterating through the pool. Besides, this is faster.

void ParticleUniverse::ParticlePool::_increaseParticleTechniquePool ( size_t  size,
Particle::ParticleBehaviourList &  behaviours,
ParticleSystem *  system 
) [protected]

Important note: Calling the _prepare() function of the cloned techniques must not be done here. It is handled in the _update() function which is called when processing all particles in the pool.
